title: CHARMING BUNGALOW Situated on a quiet cul-de-sac in Old Town La Verne.
posting_body: CHARMING BUNGALOW | POTENTIAL TO ADD UNITS | DEEP LOT WITH ALLEY ACCESS.

Situated on a quiet cul-de-sac in Old Town La Verne walking distance to University of La Verne, this charming home offers a family room with laminate floors, windows that let in plenty of light, and a ceiling fan.
There is an open breakfast nook with a chandelier that you can see from the kitchen.
The kitchen offers classic white cabinetry, a gas range, and a space for a refrigerator.
The back bedroom is open and spacious with a closet and access to the backyard.
The bathroom is centrally located in the hallway.
Exterior paint was completed last week.
The backyard features mature trees, two sheds (one with laundry and the water heater), alley access, and plenty of open space.
